item.title: Xbox - Project Scorpio
item.description:
Xbox - Project Scorpio

The most powerful console ever. Holiday 2017.

item.title: Xbox One S
item.description:
Xbox One S

Introducing the new Xbox One S. Play the greatest games lineup, including Xbox 360 classics, on a 40% smaller console. Experience richer, more luminous colors in games and video with High Dynamic Range technology. Stream 4K video on Netflix and Amazon Video, and watch UHD Blu-rayâ„¢ movies in stunning 4K Ultra HD.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: July 15th 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: July 15th 2016

This week's headlines include Call of Duty: Black Ops 3, Gold Edition, the release of the Solus Project, Song of the Deep, a brand new Forza Motorsport 6 car pack and much more.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: July 1 , 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: July 1 , 2016

This week includes a massive Halo update, the first expansion for Tom Clancy's The Division, the release of the highly anticipated indie title Inside, big BioShock news and more.

item.title: Xbox Store Ultimate Game Sale Video
item.description:
Xbox Store Ultimate Game Sale Video

Great deals for summer are here. Ultimate Game Sale begins July 5 and runs through July 11. Take advantage of over 250 offers with a savings of up to 40-60%. In addition, Xbox Live Gold members can save up to 10% more on games. http://news.xbox.com/2016/07/01/xbox-ultimate-game-sale-begins-on-july-5/

item.title: A Record-Setting E3 2016 Kicks Off a New Era of Gaming
item.description:
A Record-Setting E3 2016 Kicks Off a New Era of Gaming

Two weeks ago at E3 2016 in Los Angeles, we shared more new hardware like Xbox One S and Xbox Design Lab, more new Xbox Live features across Xbox One and Windows 10, and the biggest lineup of exclusive games than any E3 in Xbox history.

item.title: This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale
item.description:
This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale

Here are this week's games and add-on deals on the Xbox Games Store. Discounts are valid now through 04 July 2016.

item.title: Xbox - July Games with Gold
item.description:
Xbox - July Games with Gold

Play together with Xbox Live Gold. July's Games with Gold lineup for Xbox One includes The Banner Saga 2 and Tumblestone. For Xbox 360 owners (and through Xbox One backward compatibility), July kicks off with Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas 2, followed by Tron Evolution.

item.title: INSIDE now available for Xbox One
item.description:
INSIDE now available for Xbox One

Hunted and alone, a boy finds himself drawn into the center of a dark project.

item.title: The Magic Circle: Gold Edition for Xbox One
item.description:
The Magic Circle: Gold Edition for Xbox One

The Magic Circle Comes to Xbox One June 29th, 2016! A dark comedy about the creators of unfinished games, starring James Urbaniak (Venture Bros, American Splendor), Stephen Russell (Thief Series, Skyrim), Ashly Burch (Borderlands 2, HAWP), Karen Dyer (Resident Evil 5) ... and YOU. Can you out-think the game gods?
